answers.answer: I'd get a new doctor if they dismissed me like that.That's really high BP and you should be checked for preeclampsia. I'd go to the er or l&d.
Try ingesting a garlic clove crushed.  It will help with to bring your Bp down. Try taking it morning and night.It works for me.
Chest pain and high blood pressure is nothing to play with. You should go to the ER and get checked. High blood pressure can lead to a stroke.
Cant believe they said that to u. U def should go get checked out & they need to do their job
Thats south african health care for you @ Abi
Wow I'm sorry thats not right..  id definitely call another dr if u can.. u should get it checked out.. good luck

question: Hi ladies! Im currently 26 weeks and 4 days pregnant. I feel terrible. Last night i started having a terrible pain in my chest like a wind thats stuck with a huge headache. So we took my blood pressure and it was 160/137. I really had a rough night and struggle breathing. This morning we took my blood pressure again and it is 128/56. I phoned the docitrs rooms and was told it must be my imagination even though I am in agony! Any idea what it could be and how to stop this feeling?
title: Please help
